Love where you live.

Scholar’s Lofts by Renaissance Rentals. Sophisiticated downtown living, coming August 2013.

Why you’ll love Scholar’s Lofts.

Located on the corner of Walnut and 15th, Scholar’s Lofts is Bloomington’s newest luxury apartment complex. Imagine yourself on a warm Bloomington evening relaxing on your beautifully landscaped roof top patio. Inside you're welcomed home with a warm, inviting and open design. Your apartment suite is exquisitely finished; from beautiful woodwork, to stainless steel appliances, to modern Tuscan-style wrought iron fixtures. Choose from 5 thoughtfully designed one bedroom floor plans. Life is good at Scholar's Lofts. Don’t believe us? Learn more
